data.name: Leonardo Omaña
data.Profile: I'm a Front End web developer. I have experience on the implementation of web applications using a wide range of technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React and React Native. I considere my self with skills like tenacity, calm and persistence that have allowed me to constantly become a better developer and expand my knowledge in this area. I also enjoy and I am very open about teaching others.

certificate.description: Hack up furballs try to jump onto window and fall while scratching at wall.

certificate.description: Scratch at the door then walk away wack the mini furry mouse
certificate.name: Backend Developer

Academic.description: Scholarship acquired, by solving a challenge proposed by Platzi de JavaScript. Platzi in collaboration with the Ethereum Foundation created this program by giving scholarships to 100 students to boost our professional career in Web3
Meow in empty rooms. Find empty spot in cupboard and sleep all day check cat door for ambush 10 times before coming in for hack.

In addition to traditional education, I am constantly studying on platforms like Udemy, Platzi, Frontends Master. Expanding my Skills in technologies such as Express, REST, GraphQl, TDD, NodeJS, Clean Code, among others.

experience.jobDescription: Front End Developer in Rappi - Partners Portal with React. Creation of internal design libraries with StoryBook, TypeScript. Development of microsites. Testing with Jest & Testing library. Interviews with new developers for the project
Front End Developer in Web Application with Vue, Vuex and Nuxt
Frontend/Mobile Developer in React Native for 'El corte Inglés'
